title: Dear Riot and Players (My honest thought about Pool Party Team-up week)
body:
The community's attitude toward this event was pathetic. Anyone who did 1 game and said 'ok sweet now I get a free mundo skin' _**deserves to get nothing.**_

Sincerely,

Someone who actually tried on behalf of everyone else who did.

replies.body: to be honest they should have made the amour of points you needed to get the skin a lot more say like 100 which is 10 games which is fair, all things that can be taken into consideration for next event :D
I would've played a lot more...if my laptop didn't break.
